attributes.action: re-examine the deportation order served on Pegah Emambakhsh.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If deported Pegah Emambakhsh would suffer loss of liberty at the least, death, more likely, only because she is a lesbian.
The country she would be deported to (Iran) has homophobic laws, her partener has already been sentenced to death by stoning.

I would implore the UK Government to urgently re-examine this woman's case.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
